# uniteScrapeR

Currently the package uses a visible Selenium-driven Chrome session. It will open a browser window while it runs. Feed a list of species names into the function and it will return sequences and metadata info.

# install devtools if needed
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dylanstephen-s/uniteScrapeR")

library(uniteScrapeR)
library(cli)

# Usage
res1 <- unite_scrape(c("Caloplaca albolutescens", "Lobaria pulmonaria"), method = "species")
